resources.string: I used to be an adventurer like you
But then I took an arrow

Welcome to TTS Lens!

This app goal is to help visually impaired people.
App will recognize text wherever you and read it to you.

Tap 'Open Lens' screen to begin. After text enters your sight, app will try to recognize it. Tap the touchpad once to hear last recognized text in your ear.App is maintaining a history of recognized texts, so if you don't have any text in sight, you can tap again up to 10 times to hear previously recognized sentences.

Settings screen gives you an option to choose the language of audio that's been generated. Currently supported options are English and Serbian.
